headline.print_headline: Collins Has Plan for Mets’ Rotation
headline.main: Terry Collins Has Plan for Mets’ Rotation

snippet: The Mets’ manager plans to start Noah Syndergaard in Game 2 and Jacob deGrom in Game 3 of the National League Championship Series against the Cubs.
abstract: New York Mets manager Terry Collins plans to start pitcher Noah Syndergaard in Game 2 of National League Championship Series against Chicago Cubs and pitchers Jason deGrom and Steven Matz in Game 3 and Game 4.
lead_paragraph: The Mets’ manager plans to start Noah Syndergaard in Game 2 and Jacob deGrom in Game 3 of the National League Championship Series against the Cubs.
